entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
